title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 128.16 - Selection of sheriff's jurors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 128.16 - Selection of sheriff's jurors

State Regulations

The commissioner of jurors shall select, at random and in the same manner as regular trial jurors, from the persons
qualified to act as regular trial jurors, such number of persons, if any, as
may be necessary to constitute the sheriff's jurors. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
128.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
